title: Deep Learning Applications | Deep Learning Applications In Real Life | Deep learning | Simplilearn
excerpt: This video on Deep Learning Applications covers the exciting areas and sectors of business that uses Deep Learning widely every day. We will see how Deep Learning is used in healthcare to improve people's life. We will understand how Amazon, Netflix use Deep Learning to provide better customer experience.
